snippet: In a rare foray into social engineering, Facebook announced a plan to encourage users to list their donor status on their pages, a move that organ transplant experts are calling historic.
abstract: Facebook, In rare foray into social engineering, announces a plan to encourage users to list their organ donor status on their pages, move that organ transplant experts say is historic and could potentially have a profound effect.

byline.original: By MATT RICHTEL and KEVIN SACK

lead_paragraph: In a rare foray into social engineering, Facebook announced a plan to encourage users to list their donor status on their pages, a move that organ transplant experts are calling historic.

headline.seo: Facebook Urges Members to Add Organ Donor Status
headline.main: Facebook Is Urging Members to Add Organ Donor Status
headline.print_headline: Facebook Adds Feature for Organ Donor Status
